title: Divider
description: Creates visual separation between chunks of content

frontMatter.title: Divider
frontMatter.description: Creates visual separation between chunks of content

when_to_use.value: To signify a change in topic, content type, or expected interaction
To create visual separation between chunks of content
To distinguish between blocks of similar content at a glance

when_to_consider_else.value: Avoid dividers between short, individual items in close proximity unless separating navigation links
Don't use instead of whitespace or headers for vertical separation
Consider background color boxes or [Cards](/docs/components/card) for separating interactive elements (like search controls) from results

accessibility.value: Dividers are decorative elements and do not require additional ARIA attributes
Ensure sufficient color contrast for the divider line
Do not rely solely on dividers to convey meaningâ€”use proper heading structure
